name: .8 File Extension
summary: Learn about .8 files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: In Unix-like OSes, you can open an 8 file by calling the man utility using the name of the file. For example, to open shutdown.8, enter man shutdown(8).
Since 8 files are plain text files, you can also open them in any text editor, such as Vim (Linux, Mac), Microsoft Notepad (Windows), and Apple TextEdit (Mac).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
